title: Can I sell a book in PDF format? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure. It can be as easy as taking the order through PayPal (or online shopping cart) sending the buyer to the “order received” page with a link to the pdf. Of course, that's how we did it for 15 years before Kindle. But times and tools have greatly evolved, so I'm not going to suggest PayPal and a link is the best way. Your question was “can you?” And that answer is yes.

First of all is it your own written book than you can simply scan it and work to do sell …as their many sites who promote it by takeing a piece of money… But the website will gain a good amount from u and buyer as well …
